snippet.title: Flotilla 2 announcement trailer
snippet.description:
AVAILABLE NOW! https://store.steampowered.com/app/592100/Flotilla_2

Welcome to Flotilla 2, a VR game about big battleships in outer space.

Combat is turn-based and tactical: flank the enemy from all angles, find firing solutions for your cannons and tractor beams, and outmaneuver the enemy.

Good luck, captain! For more information: http://blendogames.com/flotilla2

Flotilla 2 features level design by:
• Aquma / https://twitter.com/aquma
• Valerie Lin / https://twitter.com/randomfire27
• ATL3Y / https://twitter.com/ATL3Y
• Evan Hemsley / https://twitter.com/thatcosmonaut
• Brendon Chung / https://twitter.com/blendogames
